description: Describes a monitor resource. In addition to listing the properties provided in the  CreateMonitor request, this operation lists the following properties:

parameters.name: MonitorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor resource to describe.

nested_items.name: MonitorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor resource described.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the auto predictor being monitored.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the monitor resource.

nested_items.name: LastEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the latest evaluation completed by the monitor.

nested_items.name: LastEvaluationState
nested_items.description: The state of the monitor's latest evaluation.

nested_items.name: PredictorBaseline
nested_items.description: The initial accuracy metrics for the predictor you are monitoring. Use these metrics as a baseline for comparison purposes as you use your predictor and the metrics change.

nested_items.name: BaselineMetrics
nested_items.description: The initial accuracy metrics for the predictor. Use these metrics as a baseline for comparison purposes as you use your predictor and the metrics change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: An error message, if any, for the monitor.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the monitor resource was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the latest modification to the monitor.

nested_items.name: EstimatedEvaluationTimeRemainingInMinutes
nested_items.description: The estimated number of minutes remaining before the monitor resource finishes its current evaluation.
